Sang tr·ªçng.ƒë·∫≥ng c·∫•p. Du l·ªãch.nghi d∆∞·ª°ng
Tuy·ªát v·ªùi

https://www.foody.vn/hue/indochina-place.user_titlec: Great place for wedding party and family gathering
https://www.foody.vn/hue/indochina-place.user_comment:
Imagining you have a fine dinner in a white palace with your family or close friends right after swimming in the luxury hotel, what a great weekend! This restaurant is just such  a good place where you can see how the indochina design mixed with western style. 

I order a pizza and strawberry milkshake. Food is ok. It is great if better food presentation. 

You can see the outdoor swimming pool while having the dinner. l Waiters and waitress are very friendly. 

This place is good for company party, wedding party, family and close friends gathering. 

Besides, there is a wine bar. Wine lover should not miss it.
